turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in Gervais Street in Columbia, South Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall vanilla latte to be picked up from the starbucks on gervais street in colombia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
